headline: Purposes
text.1: Companies must list purposes for the data they are sharing.
scale.1: Representation of the number of times this purpose is mentioned
scale.2: Number of times this purpose is mentioned
text.2:
To get to this number we research how often this purpose is mentioned as a reason for sharing across all data types a company shares. We multiply this by the number of companies each data type is shared with.

For structure and terminology in ordering the purposes, we refer to the Data Protection Vocabulary standard by the W3C - as we also do for the data types.
